verbose_text: In BALB/c mice, Deltapm4 parasites caused a self resolving infection while in ECM susceptible C57BL/6 and CD1 mice these parasites though failing to induce ECM progressively reached a high parasitemia and caused the death of the animals XREF_BIBR.
